Uses of Class
hu.elte.txtuml.api.Signal

  • Packages that use Signal 
    Package Description
    hu.elte.txtuml.api
    Provides the txtUML modeling API.
    hu.elte.txtuml.api.backend.messages
    As a subpackage of hu.elte.txtuml.api.backend, provides backend features for the hu.elte.txtuml.api package to help in the model execution.
    hu.elte.txtuml.stdlib
    Contains the txtUML standard library which consists of external classes (subclasses of ExternalClass) that might be used to enhance the model with some special features which are not part of the standard UML2, like Timers.

    • Uses of Signal in hu.elte.txtuml.api

      Methods in hu.elte.txtuml.api with parameters of type Signal 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Action.send(ModelClass target, Signal signal)
      Asynchronously sends the specified signal to the specified target object.
